title: Flora Springs 2015 Family Select Chardonnay (Napa Valley)
description: This wine is slightly flabby and overtly ripe, making for a dull experience on the palate.

title: Château de Costis 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
description: Showing the ripeness of the vintage, this is a smooth, lightly textured wine, with plenty of yellow and citrus fruits. The wine needs a few months, so drink from late 2017.

title: Château Thieuley 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
description: This is a light wine from the stable of offerings from the Courselle sisters. It has a pale character, just hinting at citrus flavors and lively acidity. It is an apéritif style, light, bright and ready to drink.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2016 Coreto Rosé (Lisboa)
description: This is a simple fruity wine. It has attractive red-berry fruits, giving it a light and bright character. The wine is rounded and smooth, with an attractive lift of acidity at the end.

title: Château Haut-Rian 2016 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: This wine is tart, with considerable crisp acidity. That gives it a fruit-juice freshness, although the acidity should be calmer than it is.

title: TerraNoble 2014 Reserva Terroir El Algarrobo Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
description: Meaty aromas and scents of stewed red-berry fruits are rustic. This feels hard and high in unabsorbed acidity. A strong smear of buttery oak rests on top of edgy currant and red-plum flavors, while this is spicy and oaky on the finish.

title: Quinta da Raza 2016 Dom Diogo Padeiro Rosé (Vinho Verde)
description: With its light prickle, this crisp strawberry-flavored wine is medium sweet but with acidity to balance. It's easy, fruity and ready to drink.

title: Quinta das Arcas 2016 Arca Nova Rosé (Vinho Verde)
description: A candy-pink-colored wine, this is crisp, fruity and off dry. There is a touch of caramel that fills out the otherwise acidic and red-currant-flavored palate. The wine is ready to drink.

title: Varvaglione 2016 12 e Mezzo Rosato (Salento)
description: Aromas of wild berry and a whiff of pressed spring flower lead the nose on this casual wine. The vivacious, slightly fizzy, palate offers black cherry and a candied citrus peel note alongside tangy acidity.

title: Vignerons de Tutiac 2016 Carrelet d'Estuaire  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: A pure citrus-flavored wine, this is refreshing and light. Its crispness will soften over the next few months, but drink now for the forward fruitiness.

title: Adalia 2015 Singan  (Soave)
description: Here's a light-bodied casual wine that has subdued aromas suggesting white flower, orchard fruit and a hint of almond. You can find traces of the nose on the extremely simple diluted palate.

title: Altolandon 2013 Rayuelo Bobal (Manchuela)
description: This Bobal's roasted berry and funky animal aromas hardly lay down the red carpet. Its dry spice and oak flavors smother berry and plum fruit, tasting herbal and minty on a heavy, grippy finish.

title: Château Thieuley 2016 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: The palest pink in color, this wine has a crisp texture but not much fruitiness. It is light with a touch of perfumed acidity. Drink now.

title: Côtnar Hills 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Ukraine)
description: This wine has aromas of pomegranate and black plum. It conveys flavors of cranberry and black raspberry. The finish is short-lived yet pleasantly acidic.

title: Dilao 2015 White (Kakheti)
description: Golden honey in color, this wine proffers a one-note nose of guava. Flavors of guava, apricot and flint culminate in a lightly floral finish.

title: Raventós de Alella 2015 Santa Maria Pansa Blanca (Alella)
description: This linear wine's neutral aromas vaguely resemble peach and peach pit. Its yeasty, leesy, oxidized white fruit and white bread flavors finish on a melony note but with little intensity.

title: Teanum 2016 Vento Rosato (Puglia)
description: A blend of Nero di Troia and Negroamaro, this simple wine has delicate aromas suggesting red berry, wild flower and a whiff of sea breeze. Bright and informal, the rather diluted palate offers hints of raspberry and strawberry alongside fresh acidity.

title: Lion-Gri 2014 Naturalles Semi-Sweet Muscat (Moldova)
description: This semisweet Muscat is gold in color and has aromas of caramelized peaches and honeysuckle. Flavors suggest dried apricots and canned peaches.

title: Great Sage 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description: This somewhat flat, green and tannic wine is reduced and sour in tone, with medium body and broad acidity.

title: Indomita 2016 Duette Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
description: This smells mostly of oak and barrel spice, with barely any fruit seeping through all the wood grain that's on display. Plump on the palate, this overoaked Chardonnay tastes almost entirely of resin and spice. Throw in clove and vanilla flavors on the finish, and you get the picture.

title: Herdade do Esporão 2016 Alandra Rosé (Portuguese Table Wine)
description: While the wine is dry, there is a fruitiness to it coupled with a caramel flavor that certainly makes it seem sweeter. With a crisp aftertaste, the raspberry flavored wine is ready to drink.

title: Domaine Sauvat 2015 Anthéus Chardonnay (Côtes d'Auvergne)
description: Without any wood aging, the wine shows just the yeastiness from aging on the lees. That fills the palate with spice and a touch of pepper. The wine needs a little more time. Drink from 2018.

title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2016 Légende  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: A light, bright and fruity wine from the Lafite stable, this is a fine apéritif style. Crisp green fruitiness comes with a hint of a more steely character. It is ready to drink.

title: Ribafreixo 2014 Barrancôa Red (Alentejano)
description: It's obvious there has been some oak aging here, because the wine is packed with spiciness and toast. That rather diminishes the fruit. Made to be drunk young, it may miss the target.

title: Monte Zovo 2016  Bardolino Chiaretto
description: Light-bodied and easygoing, this has delicate whiffs reminiscent of spring flower and red berry. The extremely simple fruity palate shows sour cherry and a hint of raspberry.

title: Maison Bouey 2016 Château Baruaud  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: Spicy and fruity, this light, balanced wine has easy, crisp fruit and bright acidity showing citrus and spiciness. It is a refreshing wine, ready to drink now.

title: Rutherford Ranch 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
description: This funky, grassy expression of the variety was fermented entirely in stainless steel, is thin on the palate and tastes of exotic passionfruit.

title: Príncipe de Viana 2016 Cabernet Sauvignon Rosado (Navarra)
description: This is almost red in color, with spicy bell pepper aromas resulting from early harvested Cabernet Sauvignon. Its full, chunky palate shows yeasty, lightly green and peppery flavors that linger on the finish.

title: Hanna 2014 Red Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
description: Reduced and slightly green, this wine shows a preponderance of puckeringly dry tannin and grippy oak amidst its ripe black fruit.

title: Santa Carolina 2015 Reserva Merlot (Colchagua Valley)
description: Spicy aromas of green tobacco blend with plum and berry notes. This Merlot is drying and tannic on the palate. Leafy flavors are fairly green, with generic black-fruit notes keeping it afloat.
